title: New Balance Kids' 574 V1 Essentials Hook & Loop Sneaker
features: Lightweight Foam Cushioning: The New Balance 574 sneaker for kids keeps little ones comfy at the playground and beyond. Lightweight EVA foam cushioning in the midsole and heel increases comfort
Stays Strong Through Wear-and-Tear: The comfortable upper has a lightweight fit and feel while still being durable enough to hold up through intense play, long days and general wear-and-tear
Traction and Grip: A rubber outsole adds durability while providing traction and grip on both indoor and outdoor surfaces for versatile use and easy wear
Lace-Up Closure: Whether your child is learning to tie their shoes or has perfected the challenge, these kids' sneakers will help them feel more independent when getting ready and out the door
Adult-Inspired Design for Added Style: Taking inspiration from adult models of the same name, these comfortable kids' shoes have a grown-up design to boost your little one's style and confidence
description: For a shoe that can handle your child's busy days, pick up the New Balance 574 kids' sneaker. The durable construction is ideal for active kids as it was designed to stand up to general wear-and-tear and daily play. The upper offers a lightweight feel for a more comfortable fit while the durable rubber outsole provides traction on indoor and outdoor surfaces including school hallways, the playground and everywhere in between. These kids' sneakers also include lightweight EVA foam cushioning in the midsole and heel to increase comfort. The lace-up closure lets little kids practice the challenge of tying their shoes, and helps boost confidence in more independent children. Inspired by New Balance heritage designs and finished with an adult-style sneaker silhouette, these kids' shoes add style and confidence to help kiddos take on their day. For a look the entire family can rock together, check out the men's and women's versions of these 574s.
